nkfust.selab.android.explorer.layout.view

Class ScreenSlidePagerAdapter

  • java.lang.Object
    • android.support.v4.view.PagerAdapter
      • android.support.v4.app.FragmentStatePagerAdapter
        • nkfust.selab.android.explorer.layout.view.ScreenSlidePagerAdapter
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    com.viewpagerindicator.IconPagerAdapter

    public class ScreenSlidePagerAdapter
extends android.support.v4.app.FragmentStatePagerAdapter
implements com.viewpagerindicator.IconPagerAdapter
    This is a class of inherit FragmentStatePagerAdapter.

    This usage is set to ViewPager after it instantiate, and then must use addTabView() function, using it add view of implementing TabView class to this adapter as item.

    Author:
    Zi-Xiang Lin
